He kissed his daughter on the forehead.
Why do you like strong coffee?
I say it’s worth the risk.
Where did you buy this soap?
My camera is not like yours.
All schools are closed on this holiday.
My dog \u200b\u200bhas a very long tail.
I was cold and I was wet.
to: Мне было холодно, и я был *мокрый*.

from: We came here to have fun.
All her songs were a huge success.
Where can I see a football match?
What good luck meeting you here!
I must remember to write this down.
This activity begins to bother me.
We sang songs around the fire.
We need to deal with this.
Twins were born to his wife.
I leave it up to you.
Don't make me get the belt.
He gave her a foot massage.
He recently went to see her.
Your guard would not let me in.
The store raised prices for all products.
Throw the two of you home?
No one invited me to a dance.
Do you have aspirin with you?
I thought you read my resume.
How do you know this is fake?
I finished cleaning up the apartment.
He gently laid a hand on her shoulder.
to: Он *нежно* положил руку на её плечо.

from: We are grateful for your assistance.
He showed me his photo album.
There was a storm that night.
In an instant, everything was over.
This machine is easy to handle.
Has the parcel not yet arrived?
I wish I had a million dollars.
to: Вот бы у меня был *миллион* долларов.

from: We decided not to fire you.
I went to the mall yesterday.
I want to see you again.
I am pretty sure it was an elephant.
to: Я вполне уверен, что это был *слон*.

from: This sword is heavier than I thought.
Do you have change with one dollar?
to: Есть у вас *сдача* с одного доллара?

from: This hall was full of people.
I cannot give you their names.
to: Я не могу *назвать* вам их имён.

from: The room was in perfect order.
I want to change my appearance.
Your reputation goes ahead of you.
He was too old to swim.
Not a single bone is broken.
